name: wix-ui-tpa-connected
description: Connection of Wix UI TPA to settings made simple

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run buildDev
scripts.buildDev: npm run fake-package && ./node_modules/.bin/wutc-generator generate && rm -rf ./cache/generator && npm run restore-package
scripts.clean: mv ./package.json.real -f ./package.json || true && find *.js | grep -v jest.config.js | xargs rm || true && rm -rf ./cache || true
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf ./node_modules || true && rm ./package-lock.json || true && npm install

author: Vytenis Urbonavicius
